Projects

Kubernetes Platform

Link to project (eg. sproogen.github.io/modern-resume-theme)(optional)

A kubernetes deployment for a microservice stack using terraform, EKS, fluentd, and dynatrace.

Taking a microservice architecture that is running on EC2 and deploying it into kubernetes. This project consists most of reference architecture and strategy for engaging with EKS to host the various services.
